GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Serves a single article object by the given article ID.

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Returns an array of comments for the given article ID, sorted by the most recent first.
